name: Tutorial
dialogueScript: To play this game you need to select the correct tiles to win
The top tiles and left tiles cannot be selected as highlighted in purple
These instead represent the number of correct tiles in that column or row
The numbers represented in blue represent the number of tiles nearby
The number 2 for example means there is 2 selectable tile adjacent to it
The yellow flashing tile represent the total number of tiles you can click
keep in mind the number may go negative if you over click
This flashing icon represent the mirror in the grid
Depending on the icon all selected tiles will be mirrored
A plus icon would mean any corner tile will be mirrored to every other corner
Certain numbers will not appear in the blue grid like 0, 1, 8 and 9
For columns and rows only the number 0 and the maximum number of correct tiles wont appear
